website_summaries.verdict: A "miracle" product for pet owners. Removes serious pet stains and odors from carpets. Non-toxic and earth friendly.
pros: Users who have tried everything for urine, vomit, and other pet accidents, claim their search is over after discovering this solution
Versatile use for both carpet cleaners and spot treatment
cons: Expensive but for many well worth the price
Though not harmful, the minty scent is too strong for some
Not recommended to the very fragrance sensitive

customer_reviews.title: I had used carpet cleaners with all kinds of recommended cleaners. But it just didn’t have an impact
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of the ratings. I just have to say they’re accurate. I had a room that had housed some pets while we were away at work and over many years accidents happened. When you’re not there to clean it up right away the carpet gets stained. I had used carpet cleaners with all kinds of recommended cleaners. But it just didn’t have an impact. After using up the last of another cleaner I had I finally opened this one. The pictures are just after some light spot cleaning and one round with the carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deep Clean Pet Odor Eliminator
customer_reviews.text: All around 5 stars!! Used this on a rug that before I moved in was used as a cats room. I don't know the last time this rug had been cleaned. I didn't think it was possible it could be cleaned!! I am highly impressed! Smells amazing. The rug difference says it all! (Walls are different in color because I just painted them too) If you're looking for a deep clean and let odor remover this is the one!!
customer_reviews.author: LConti

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty even on old carpet, smells great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really quick. I was hesitant because a small bottle was a lot more than buying something by Hoover or Bissell; however, this definitely worked much better. Our carpet is older and we’re working on replacing it but with one puppy and then another shortly after.... the before picture speaks for itself. It’s not perfect; however, like I said, our carpet is from 2011 and old so I didn’t expect it to be pristine. Definitely worth the extra money as this worked much better than previous carpet cleaners we have purchased. Definitely spot treat any heavily stained areas as it makes a huge difference! Smells really good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jade R.

customer_reviews.title: Neglected Carpet Revived!
customer_reviews.text: I used this "miracle" in conjunction with Hoover Power Scrub FH50150 on my neglected 20 years of carpet. I'll let the pictures do the talking. I ran out of solution in the second pic, so you can see the dirty side on the right.
customer_reviews.author: John Wang

customer_reviews.title: So so so good.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this. I used it along with a Bissell rental machine from Petsmart. My carpet looks like it did when I first moved in. It smells AMAZING too!!!
customer_reviews.author: tamara de oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on white carpeting. Smells great! Included photos for before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie R

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!!
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews but this I had to! I have 10 year old carpet that I’m trying to make last as long as I can... because kids. Who wants to spend the money to replace flooring when they will just mess it up! I cleaned my sons carpet with this for the first time today and it looks and smells SOOOOO much better than it was! Other carpet cleaning products I’ve used have made the carpet smell like wet dog while cleaning and this didn’t! Smelt great the whole time! I’m hooked!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: I have an elderly lab that like to dig under the deck and then come in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have an elderly lab that like to dig under the deck and then come in and sleep in our bedroom. Her spot was red from the mud. I have tried many, many solutions. This one has proven to be the best. This is my before and after... just one use. I still need to do another or two, but I'm amazed. This was done without pretreating. I will pretreat on the next cleaning and see if it makes a difference. Regardless, I'm VERY happy with this product. Bonus... it smells AMAZING. I nice subtle clean smell. Pics show before and after (one use)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Cleaner not meant for pets per say
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 dogs and recently rescued a new puppy , suffice to say someone has been urinating in our living room oriental type rug in both corners - tried concentrated rug machine solutions to no avail and no results (yes these products help clean rug but still notice staining and odor esp after cleaning ) Tried this stuff and once again disappointed - not even a week later one of the dogs urinated in both spots again , it’s not a marking cleaner I get that but can’t recommend this product unless you want to waste your money on a glorified cleaner and honestly should not be marketed for pets whatsoever but maybe just generalized cleansing
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Took most of a coffee stain off a mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a huge coffee stain that was left on a mattress. Don't know long long the stain had been there, as guest neglected to tell us she spilled an entire cup of coffee on our brand new mattress. It worked incredibly well. I am so pleased with the results. We've since started using it as our go to carpet cleaner, which with two littles running around, it gets used often! And the smell isn't bad. Very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Stumbling upon this product, I was excited to purchase & receive the highly acclaimed "Carpet Miracle." However, after receiving it and testing it out, it seems it didn't make much difference on my chihuahua's pee stains. As you can see from the images, before and after there were not much difference. I spoke to Amazon, and they provided a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hayase

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for pet stains/odors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Carpet Miracle in hopes of cleaning up a urine spot where my dog had an accident. I swear I have gone over that same spot 5-6 times with a full tank in my carpet cleaner. But to no avail... The smell still lingers. I do not recommend this product for pet use. I bought it after reading wonderful reviews, so I'm pretty disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get stains out.
customer_reviews.text: Smell wasn't too bad, it did have a minty side to it - but it definitely gave us all headaches and we're usually not that sensitive. The problem was it didn't work on stains. They're all still there. So, I get to go back over the carpets and use our regular cleaner that works for a little while - until the spots return. Also, it definitely foamed during the rinse cycle of our machine. That's problematic for me because it means dirt will be attracted to those areas and I'll be cleaning the carpet again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Megara

customer_reviews.title: Happy, then really disappointed☹️
customer_reviews.text: This product cleaned my carpet really well. Sadly though the nice fresh scent faded after a few days and the pet odor came back. I used the entire 32 oz. bottle in a space approx 4x6, over several days. I thought perhaps my pugs were still using the area for a bathroom but after the second cleaning was dry, I checked the area daily and there are no new stains. I’m not sure why the smell won’t come out but it’s driving me insane. I’ve tried vinegar and baking soda also and the smell just lingers.
customer_reviews.author: Barbi Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Works but reeks
customer_reviews.text: This worked well enough, but the smell, oh!!! It smells like expired granny perfume and dead flowers. It was so overpowering that the carpet had to be re-shampooed twice. "Airing out" did NOT get rid of the smell. Make sure you like the smell before you clean with it - it is not going to be "less on the carpet." It is amplified on the carpet! Even my mother who can't smell hardly anything complained. I would have returned, but "too much" was used. Bleah! I wouldn't inflict this smell on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ntech1

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I did not spot clean, used the whole bottle added to the cleaning solution tank and filled with hot water (1 gallon). I actually cleaned quite a bit, and it did get some spots up without me having to spot clean. Smells GREAT! Downside? It isn't as concentrated as I would have thought. Very expensive to use a whole bottle for only one cleaning. It did not get up the heavy traffic spots, I guess you'd have to use the undiluted solution to do that. Will I buy it again? Maybe. Did it work? Yes, but it's not a miracle cleaner. I'll likey continue to buy the concentrated Bissell cleaner for houses wtmith pets. It's far cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kelle Braun

customer_reviews.title: Super effective and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought this stuff after seeing it advertised in a BuzzFeed article because it was pet friendly and had incredible reviews. You really don't need to use much to get a good clean and pleasant smell. Honestly, using too much makes the smell overpowering in the house. Just a little makes everything smell clean and you can see just how disgusting the junk is that it gets out of the carpets when you empty the dirty water tank of your carpet cleaning machine. We have 4 dogs so I clean the carpets pretty regularly. I recommend this stuff to everyone! I even used it on my neighbor's white rug and it was incredible!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells spot on like Febreze (blue canister). Perfume lingers too long.
customer_reviews.text: Not mint in any way to us. It did clean but you wonder if that is just the hot water doing it's thing. I was hoping since it was all non-toxic etc that the odor would dissipate quickly. I wouldn't mind if it was a mint scent. But this "perfumed" scent like lingers way too long. Have had to keep the windows cracked for days despite it being cold out. If your sensitive to chemical smells you may not like this. My husband says it smells like the spray they use in hotel rooms, that he requests not be used for this very reason.
customer_reviews.author: JeLOTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming smell and less than average cleaning abilities
customer_reviews.text: First I'd like to say I am disappointed in how the product is advertised. It makes it sound like you use considerably less product than actually described on the back of the bottle. Second, for heavy-duty cleaning, the scent is overwhelming. I even went over the carpeting again with water, hoping it would help the smell to dissipate. No such luck. The smell permeated the first floor of our home for two weeks. I'm also not impressed with how well it cleans carpeting. Woolite's carpet cleaner works just as well combined with Oxyboost. And I used far less product when using these two products and paid less for them. I won't buy the cleaner again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't read any other review for this product... Read this one.... IT WORKS! Period.. Bottom line.. Best we have used... And even better than having it professionally done... Ask me how I know.. We rescue... Don't think we we've ever had all of em house broken at once... Not that you could tell... Because we use this! I'm very skeptical.. And read reviews like crazy... This one actually does what it is advertised to do! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results using the carpet cleaner formula in our Bissell ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results using the carpet cleaner formula in our Bissell Carpet machine Great smell in the room upon completion not overpowering or hospital smell just a pleasant clean smell very pleasant I also purchased spray version to spray on laminate wood floors allowing it to seep into spaces between hardwood floor slats to gobble up any old urine deposits that found their way in there Great product the price is best measured against end results you get what you pay for I am sure there are cheaper products listed but take it from one who's been up that road Do you want sanitized clean and pleasant smelling results or just another disappointing episode with a bargain priced ineffective formula
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This smells really good and neutral. Nothing to overwhelming. However I have two labs and have used this several times and the smell is still there. I got a different product that worked a lot better in my opinion. We have the spray also. Work when we only had our 12lb westie but she rarely had accidents. We bought it after she got into chocolate (she was safe and we took her to the vet to get her stomach pumped) and got it all over the floor and it worked amazing to clean that. But for dog smells...not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Dunnigan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell and Poor Performance
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the smell this product has left behind. It's been a week since I used this in my carpet cleaner and I feel like the only way I'll get rid of the smell is by redoing the entire carpet with another type of cleaner. It's almost like a wet dog/flowery/powdery odor. The product didn't clean very well either compared to the machine brand shampoo I normally use.
customer_reviews.author: Humby

customer_reviews.title: One of the best odor/stain removers for pets. Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I have 4 dogs in the house with carpet. The carpet requires shampooing every month. This product works great, cleans well, and does not cause allergies in the dogs. When people come over, they don't realize we even have dogs as there is no pet odor. The scent dissipates in a few days. Pros: 1) Cleans well. 2) Nice fragrance. 3) No pet allergy reactions. 4) Good for spot cleaning. Cons: 1) A non scented version may be nice as the fragrance needs to be vented out, primarily in the day.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs and my living room carpet was horrible due to my 13 year old dog. I tried several sprays and stuff to clean my carpets with my carpet cleaner but never could get the smell out. I put this cleaner in my carpet cleaner and went over it twice. I let the carpet dry and I do not smell anything at all. I was actually really surprised that it worked so good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Miracle!!!
customer_reviews.text: When something is this good I like to share with EVERYONE!!!! Guys, I have cream colored carpet in Alaska, who does that!?! It’s impossible to keep clean between a dog, 3 kids, and endless adventuring. My male dog decided to mark and left a pee stain I could NOT get out. I tried a ton of other cleaners but the stain remained. This stuff took out the stain after months of no luck. I tried it on the mystery stain Id been covering with a rug, GONE! It doesn’t smell like anything amazing, normal carpet cleaner kind of smell but it’s not strong or offensive. This stuff is a miracle and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mpprincess

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, cleans GREAT
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats recently developed a swollen urethra and was constantly trying to pee. This lead to going outside of the box, in the living room, on the rug - which soaked through to the carpet. After we got him to the vet and on meds (poor dude), I busted this cleaner out along with our Hoover carpet cleaner. This cleaner smells nice, but not over powering, and the smell dissipates as it drys along with all the unwanted smell of cat urine. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: 3llibean

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money ...Not Returnable
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT do anything that it stated it would. The smell, the "stain" etc were all still there after using this product multiple times. There is nothing in the ad that states you can not return, (that I saw) I only found out when it was too late. Not sure how others are getting this to work so amazingly for them, but it sure did not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sue F

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best carpet cleaning solution I have ever purchased! I have two dogs since they were some tini tiny lil things, so you know what that means! Squirt here and a poop there. Thought we were going to have to get our carpet replaced until I came across this magic stain and odor eraser!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works great!
customer_reviews.text: Third time purchasing this product. Love it. You don’t necessarily have to have pets to appreciate it’s effectiveness. Great for spills, foot traffic markings, throw rugs and larger area rugs that need freshing up. Mint leaves a lovely fresh fragrance! So happy we tried this. Much better product than what you can purchase in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Our elderly cat had a series of accidents on one section of carpeting in our family room. The area had been treated and deep cleaned several times. The stains were still evident. I bought this product based on glowing reviews here on Amazon. It did an excellent job in getting the stains out. Also, my partner is a Chef and wears his greasy kitchen shoes in the house. I feel that is a contributing factor to the staining in this area. There is still a very slight amount of staining. I plan to redo the carpet again and expect to see even better results. The scent is mild/pleasant but the cleaning power is amazing. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell and cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. I have an 11 year old dog who sometimes has an accident, and I own a bissel carpet cleaner. I’ve tried every different rug cleaning solution, because I am incredibly picky when it comes to scent. This stuff smells so good that I want to dive into the bottle. And it works! The whole house smells fantastic and the carpets are beautiful. Even carpets that looked really good before cleaning brought up tons of dirt with this solution. I’ve added it to my subscribe and save because I never want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: S. Josselyn

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it worked on some set in stains!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good on this cleaner. I have a heated carpet machine, and I was only using one brand of cleaner, which was doing a good job, but I wondered if something else worked better. I tried this product out this morning, and my carpets smell and look great. This cleaner DOES recommend a warm water rinse after cleaning, which I did, and the water was still discolored, so obviously I'll be doing another cleaning sooner rather than later. I have 3 dogs, so I probably should clean the carpets each week, but realistically, it's more like every 2-3 weeks. I look forward to continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT COUCH CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: OMG....If you are looking to get stains, or odors, out of your couch then this is definitely the product to purchase. I recently purchased a new microfiber power reclining sofa and my puppy jumped on it and was so excited to see my friend peed all over the seat. I used the machine I recently purchased from Amazon with some other cleaner the smell was horrid. I looked on Amazon and saw the raving reviews about Carpet Miracle and thought I have nothing to loose by trying it. Well I am glad I did because the stain and odor is gone and my couch looks brand new. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has pretty severe anxiety which causes her to have accidents on the carpet from time to time. I've tried a bunch of cleaners, but this one has so far worked the best. The smell and the stains in some areas are not 100% gone, but they were pretty set in and I wasn't expecting miracles. BUT it did get rid of many of them and I found myself pleasantly surprised. Decent smell, didn't bleach my carpet (light beige), got rid of like 90% of the stains and smell. Am definitely going to buy this product again. So overall like a 4.5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not great at all. Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to deep clean my carpets. The smell isn't that great. It's kind of minty? Not terrible until they dried and my carpets smelled musty and like wet dirt. Also did not pick up any of the newish stains. Followed directions to a T.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to expectation
customer_reviews.text: I read about this product on Buzzfeed and it was highly recommended for stain removal. Unfortunately, it didn’t remove my stain but it did clean by about 40 - 50%. As far as cleaning, it worked about the same as the one I made from a pin on Pinterest that cost a fraction the price,
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cleaning with a not so over powering scent. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have 4 large dogs and 3 kids and live out in the country with a lot of dirt...my carpets needed as much help as they could get. I read the reviews online and decided to try it. I used 6oz for heavy duty cleaning and it smells amazing and my carpets have never been cleaner. I will definitely be buying this product again. Side note-I normally shampoo my carpets at least once a month or every two months, but since the COVID thing started and my kids have been home everyday...it’s been a few months since I was able to shampoo them. But I’m still impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Olson

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Product smells good and definitely sanitizes the carpet without any issues. Was not able to get some moderate staining out, even after pre treating the spots. I would say this product is better than most on the shelf products i have used in the past but still not quite the best for heavy staining.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Smells great & works like a wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner that smells wonderful! I ran out of it and used the carpet cleaner that came with my machine. It was awful! I had to do twice the work and it still wasn’t as clean and fresh as Sunny and Honey. People comment on the pleasant smell and it works really well on cleaning my carpet. My dog and husband were bringing in a LOT of dirt from outdoors. I knew that one carpet was dirty but didn't realize how bad until I used this with my carpet cleaner. The solution works well to clean up the dirt and I love that it doesn't have all the harsh, nasty chemicals found in other cleaners. Only cleaner I will use!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: With a 3 year old, 3 dogs, and a husband who loves to wear his work boots all the time our 12 year old carpet has seen many spills, accidents , vomit, grease and dirt from everyone. I needed something that was gonna take care of everything. This REALLY WORKS!!!! pictures are proof. My house smells better and looks a million times better and I'm not embarrassed to have the lights on in the loving room with company over anymore. I used this in the Hoover dual power max carpet washer. I am so happy with this product and the results it has been a game changer for sure!!! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Denise H

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used this to get rid of pet odors and dirt stains in my carpet. The smell is a fresh pleasant smell, not too strong. It really got out the general dirt stains from my dogs. I have already purchased another to use in the future. I did use a different enzyme spray to combat pet stains so I can't comment on this alone removing the pet odor from urine. The size of the jar was smaller than I was expecting, but I was able to clean a few rooms and part of a hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Backus

customer_reviews.title: No more cat pee smells
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner reminds me of those pastel mints. It is a soft mint smell. It really did the job at cleaning my carpet. My cat had a accident in the corner of the carpet, and this clearer did the job. I was worried that my cat would still smell the urine after I cleaned the carpet, so I cleaned the carpet start with just water first, then I cleaned with the carpet miracle three times to be sure that the smell was gone. That was 7 days ago and my cat has not when back to the corner. Thank You Carpet Miracle
customer_reviews.author: NevadaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great at getting rid of pet stains
customer_reviews.text: We have a 16 year old cat with some typical "geriatric" issues. This product takes the worst stains and odors out. I even use it to steam clean my rugs. Let it sit a few minutes and it will work magic. And I have never had a stain "resurface" once it dries. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Got pets? Got carpet? Have to have Carpet Miracle!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs, two of which are quite elderly. We are talking a 12-year-old Golden Retriever (amazing for that breed) and a still spry 15 year old Australian Cattle Dog. However, due to their age at times there are accidents in my home, some very serious. I put this in my carpet cleaner and the stain, odor, and memory are gone. The sad look on the dog's face is replaced by a hug and a cuddle. Carpet Miracle is a miracle. I always have some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Alison A

customer_reviews.title: It Cleans, But I Think I Bought the Wrong Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat who is having "accidents". I think I bought the wrong Sunny & Honey product. The carpet cleaning went fine, but when I hit a pet stain/odor spot in the carpet, it amplified the smell for a couple of days. I plan to try the pet stain product since it gets high marks on Amazon reviews It's now May 26 and I wanted to amend my review. I should have used the enzyme cleaner first, then cleaned the carpet with this product. With some guidance from Sunny & Honey,I cleaned the same area again and did not get the "amplified" smell during the treatment. Carpet looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Not

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I had a houseguest who brought their 10lb dog. He was marking everywhere and it was driving me insane. We put a dog diaper on him then used a blacklight to find all the urine. Unfortunately, this product got some of the fresh urine out but not even close to all of it. The urine that was 2 days old did not cone out. The scent is pleasant but for such a small bottle, the price is too high. This is especially true because it didnt remove the urine.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hill

customer_reviews.title: Oxi-clean who?
customer_reviews.text: About a month ago I spilled some coffee on my office carpet (which I never do) And no matter what Cleaning solution I used in my Bissell carpet cleaner, the stain seemed to re-appear a week later. I came across this product through an article in buzzfeed where there were glowing reviews, so I took a leap of faith and am glad I did. 3 weeks later after using the solution the stain hasn’t re-appeared. Color me happy. It also has a very pleasant scent. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: 4EverYoung

customer_reviews.title: I am a first time user of this product.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy, I placed another order. The product was able to pull dried blood out of the carpeting. It even pulled stains from a carpet that I had tried to remove a few years ago. The smell is pleasant. This product was used on carpeting that is 26 years old. I will be using it in more areas, as well as my area rug in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We have animals and wanted something that would clean our rugs without all of the nasty chemicals. We found this one and were encouraged by the high ratings so we ordered it. This is a product that lives up to the hype. It cleans our rugs beautifully, removes odors (from dogs and cats) and leaves a clean, fresh scent behind. We use this with a carpet cleaning machine and could not be happier. We’ve had this on auto delivery for quite a while and wouldn’t be without it. Full disclosure, the company contacted us and asked if we would leave an honest review of the product. The opinions are our own.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: No better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: This just worked as well as any average carpet shampoo, and we even used 6 oz, the recommended amount for deep cleaning. No reason for the added cost over other shampoos. Also, it recommended rinsing the area after cleaning with plain water, who wants to do that?
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed
customer_reviews.text: The product smells really nice. I have 2 puppies that have had a hard time with potty training. I have been looking everywhere to find something that will take the pee smell out of the carpet. I have tried this for the 3rd time in a row (of course, I waited for it to dry before shampooing again), and it has not removed the pee smell from the carpet. I will have to try something else! I was disappointed because of all of the awesome reviews - I was sure this would work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: My male dog still thinks he needs to let everyone know what he considers his. My daughter likes to color, draw, drop candy, gum, and toothpaste on carpets. After pre-treating with a carpet stain fighter, I must say that my carpets look like new. Highly recommended. A caveat...if you have pets, you may need to clean out the brushes of pet hair a couple of times while using it. That is to be expected since this thing is working deep in the carpet fibers to pick up whatever dirt and animal hair has been deposited. Of course, you need to vacuum first. Vacuum slowly and give the vacuum time to get everything it can up before you try to shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: Made from the gods. This stuff is expensive but it works. I have 5 dogs. I’m pretty much an expert on dog cleaning products. Just spend the money and use the product correctly, shampoo clean and rinse. It works.
customer_reviews.author: john bradley young

customer_reviews.title: Okay for odors, but not the best for pet problems
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for about a year now with a house of 3 cats and a dog. While we found the product worked great on getting rid of the odors left in the carpet and area rugs, it took multiple passes to clean simple cat vomit (aka furballs etc). This product seems to work just as good as the others that we have used in the past, with the only difference being that of the odor elimination and the inconvenience of having to order via Amazon. Also with this product you have to spend a bit more time due to having to do a rinse cycle/pass after you clean via the solution.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hatt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I l just love this product so much. We have two young kids and a dog and this product works great on our white carpet in our family room. The kids and dog play all day long on this carpet so it sees a lot of wear & tear, dirt and food stains that are no match for this cleaner. I absolutely love that it is non-toxic so I don't have to worry about exposing them to harmful chemicals, made in the USA and they also donate a portion of sales to animal organizations. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Great at killing odors
customer_reviews.text: I have used many pet carpet cleaners and this by far is the best one. The smell is so so Fresh and clean and doesn’t leave that weird pet urine cleaner residue smell after. I kept smelling my shirt wondering if it was my perfume or the cleaner. It smells that good. Love! Wish it came in a a bigger bottle. This is good for many 2 times in a 2 bed apartment with carpet only in the rooms only but other then that it’s great!!! You get what you pay for I guess!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Bstein

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a professional in the cleaning industry for decades. I bought this to deal with issues from my little dog being ill. This not only lifted stains, but removes odors, and left no sticky detergent residue to attract dirt to my carpets. Extremely pleased with this purchase and will continue buying from them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for those that want clean carpet!
customer_reviews.text: Alright guys, I am INSANE IN THE MEMBRANE about carpet cleaning. With 3 kids it is a WEEKLY necessity. I usually use Hoover or Bissell cleaning products.. however I was left feeling like there has to be BETTER. Well there is!! The right side is Bissell and left side is my new cleaner. I am disgusted and excited. It smells AMAZING and my floors feel so soft and clean. I will never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda K.

customer_reviews.title: 10+ years smoke damage, 3 years of dog damage - gone
customer_reviews.text: One of the bedrooms in my house was (1) smoked in for ten years (2) used as a literal kennel room, housing up to four large dogs in airline crates at a time. Needless to say the carpet in that room was disgusting. I was considering ripping out and replacing -- but I figured gambling $20 on this product would be well worth it if it worked. Well, we can hold off on the carpet replacement. It didn't remove all the stains completely, but the heavy traffic and stained areas of the carpet are MILES better than they were.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: 100% got rid of dog pee smell!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! Because nothing I have tried has ever worked before, I waited THREE months to try it and omg...I should’ve used it the day I received it!! My dogs stay in a room whenever we are gone and have been peeing on the carpet instead of their pee pad for some reason! Nothing I used got the smell out but I used this with my bissell proheat carpet cleaning vacuum and WOW. One time is all it took for the smell and the stains to completely disappear. I’m shocked and amazed and I will definitely recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 little dogs and plenty of little potty spots to treat on a regular basis and then I steam clean about once a month. I love Carpet Miracle because it really does get rid of the urine odor without smelling like it's been treated with heavy chemicals. I've been using it for years and always recommend it to others who have small dogs with the same issues...and they like it too.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent! I have been using Carpet Miracle for years. I tried other carpet cleaners, and they did not compare. When you have a cat that gets sick do to hairballs this is a must. It gets out stains and odor. Once When I went for a walk and didn’t realize I stepped in dog dodo and got some on my shoes went inside my house got some on the carpet. Carpet Miracle to the rescue! A must if you own pets.
customer_reviews.author: S Trent

customer_reviews.title: In general has worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have found this product to be really good. It really does clean and deodorize carpets really well. When I did my basement which had some pet stains and some water that was leaking from the outside on the carpet it left a very musty moldy smell as it was drying. Carpet on the upper floors that I’ve used it on that don’t have a damp room come out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Swishopper

customer_reviews.title: Works better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs, 3 of which are potty training puppies. I have a White carpet and the smell just wasn't coming out. I did some research and I came across this product. After the first use my carpet looked and smelled great! It's helped with potty training them because it eliminated their odor from the old stains. I tell all my friends to get this product, it's truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: TorriB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. The first time I used it my home smelled great and the nice smell seemed to last, until... The second time I used it my home smelled great again but the nice smell did not last like it did the first time. I'm not sure why that was, my "zoo" or a function of the product? I think it's a great product and it cleans and definitely gets the odor out, the longevity of the nice smell is my only issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt mask smell or stains. The stains didnt reoccur later after the flooring dried and settled. It act It actually pulls out .
customer_reviews.text: Must buy! My carpet was disgusting. 11 years of kids- animals- I bought a cleaner also from Amazon too. I have used many things before on the carpet as I had given up. I decided to try again. Searched around for a few days- this cleaner didn't mask the odor. Once usually you shampoo if there was pet urine in the carpet it would pull the smell up and then you dealt with that. Not this cleaner- 2 weeks later the room smells so fresh. Along with the Hoover steamer I purchased I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sommerrae

customer_reviews.title: A must for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I was actually shocked, I try to buy cruelty free, environmentally friendly products but sometimes feel they don't work as well but are worth it but that is not the case here, this is a great cleaner. I used it in my carpet / upholstery cleaner and it worked absolutely fabulous. One time did the job. My pets are pretty good but every once in a while I need a good cleaner and this is definitely it. I have already bought my second bottle just to have on hand. Great product and thanks for being animal friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya K.

customer_reviews.title: Helped made the room inhabitable again
customer_reviews.text: My cat began peeing on the corner of my throw rug. I used this in my carpet washer, and it did a great job. I couldn't get the smell and mess completely out, but I think that has more to do with the carpet being high piled and thoroughly saturated in grossness. I don't think I could save the carpet, but for now, it smells and looks far better than it did before.
customer_reviews.author: hAppy

customer_reviews.title: Did not provide a deep clean
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for us. Based on the reviews We thought this was the right product for us, but it didn't remove hardly any dirt. We used Bissell last time and that worked fine, but we were looking for a product to give a deeper clean. It smells great and removed some odor from our carpet, but we were overall disappointed with the product and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars isn’t enough! After seeing this show up on an Amazon most recommended list, I decided to try it. I have a Great Dane and 2 cats. It got out old stains as well as new messes. The scent is super pleasant as well. My 17 year old daughter spilled an entire package of heavily pigmented fluorescent pink makeup powder on her cream colored carpet, and it took out about 98% of it!! I use it as an all purpose cleaner for my carpet cleaning machine.
customer_reviews.author: KevinN

customer_reviews.title: A Mircle Working Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I have finally found a carpet solution that I am highly satisfied with! I used the Carpet Mircle carpet cleaner and deodorizer today I only had to wash and rinse once, unlike with other cleaners I used. And the fresh clean smell of the carpet was more than I had expected!! It worked great in my Hoover Power Scrub Carpet Washer! I would definitely recommend this product. "
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cleaner/deodoriser that I have ever used! The scent is light and a friend even said my house smells like a spa :-)
customer_reviews.author: M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find many reviews on how this smells so i was a little worried about that. After using it i can say it cleans great and leaves a clean fresh scent. Im pregnant and very sensitive to smells. Its not overpowering and doesn't cause a headache, but its strong enough to where you smell it and eliminates any previous odors. it says mint scented, but to me it doesn't smell like mint. Its a very nice clean smell. much more pleasant than mint.
customer_reviews.author: sarah currin

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog has been using my carpeted hallway as her own personal bathroom. I have been using some of the more common carpet cleaning solutions and they clean my carpet great, there is just lingering urine smell. I bought this because I have read the reviews and I wanted to see how well it did. Well, it lives up to the hype! My carpet is clean, no stains and I don't smell dog urine every time I walk down my stairs. I will always be buying this! I used it in my Hoover carpet cleaner and let it just mix itself, but just make sure to rinse well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Attalla

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was very optimistic about this carpet cleaner thanks to the rave reviews... I had some old pet stains that I was hopeful this carpet cleaner would remove, as many reviews had said.. However, I was not so fortunate. The carpet cleaner did seem to clean my carpet that was not stained, however, it did not touch the old stains. Would be a good standard carpet cleaner, but it is not anything magical or special.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Bugaieski

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not good in my humble opinion. To me it smells like you are trying to cover up pet odor and honestly that's like trying to cover up a fresh dookie with potpourri in a room the size of a closet. It just makes the smell much worse. I will look for a neutralizing odor product with no scent... does that exist? I do have a dog, but his smell wasn't the concern for cleaning the carpets. I had my windows open for days and the smell is still lingering. I appreciate the non-harmful ingredients though!
customer_reviews.author: DisquisitiveMe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Carpet Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Had some tough stains in front of the recliners in the tv room. Tried several different products over the years, and this is by far the best stuff I have used. Stains have almost been completely eliminated. The carpet is 30 years old, so it’s been well used. Looks almost new.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: The smell alone is amazing. Other products did not please the nostrils. My pregnant wife has a very sensitive nose right now and she absolutely loved the smell. We used it one a rug that our dog so lovingly peed on. It smelled exactly like you would imagine and it kept lingering. One use of this, the smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Judge24

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaner i've ever used
customer_reviews.text: this is an incredible product i have off white carpets throughout the house they are 30 years old i had a fire and carpet was black. had carpet people out to replace and the hallway alone was 3,000 dollars to replace. after they left i used this product and it looks almost new and new. incredible
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Best stuff ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Made a disgusting carpet like new gain. We cannot recarpet until escrow closes. We cleaned the horrible mess with our new hoover carpet shampooer. The combination of the 2 was perfect. I had before & after pictures, but it's not letting me add them. I'll try to amend this with the pictures. I also had some regular grocery store shampoo that I tried. HUGE difference between the two. I purchased more of this before I was even done using what I already bought.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy s.

customer_reviews.title: ... an apartment so the carpet quality is not the greatest. I had a stain that occurred from a ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment so the carpet quality is not the greatest. I had a stain that occurred from a garbage can liner leaking a long line of... I don't know what... across a 4 foot piece of carpeting. The stains that occurred I tried to get up after seeing them, but no home remedies worked. Bought a steam cleaner I had been wanting and this product. I am totally amazed at how well it worked. The stain is gone. I need to add that I had tried EVERYTHING with a lot of elbow grease and nothing. Whatever it was in my carpet this product removed after completely after two applications in two days :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cat D.

customer_reviews.title: Good home pets stain remover for high traffic areas
customer_reviews.text: I like the cleaning power the scent is fresh but lingers and does take the stains out so I can recommend it over your regular Bissel or commercial rug machine shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Not too artificial smelling
customer_reviews.text: Used with bissel proheat machine. Smell is pleasant but didnt trigger my scent allergies. Machine requested max of 3 oz per tank. 1 tank cleaned 2 average size bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: For Simon

customer_reviews.title: This is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: My carpets have never been this clean! I have oatmeal colored carpet and have tried everything to keep it clean and get the stains out. This product is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Burgman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't remove even the most basic of dirt stains. I do not have a dirty home or bad floors, and it didn't even do the trick for me. The Hoover brand shampoo is 1000% better.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Gets out urine odor
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescue dog who has potty issues. And our other dog is learning bad behavior from him. The carpet is absolutely trashed and needs replacing but other expenses always get in the way. We have tried seemingly every cleaner on the market and nothing gets rid of the urine smell. I bought this on Amazon prime day and just hoped it was worth the cost. I used a 50/50 ratio and it completely removed the odor. It didn't get all of the stains, but I didn't have any expectations for that. Like I said, the carpet is trashed. It is expensive but it really does work.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pardoe

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the cleaner. It has a good smell kind of minty. I’ve used several name brands but this was by far the best in smell and cleaning. It Pulled a black stain from tools out of the carpet pictured That no other brand had been able to get out and removed the throw up smell from my daughters carpet. I will Definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carpet cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I have 3 dogs in the house and live in the country with ponds they love to swim in. My carpets get really dirty and doggy smelling. I’ve used other products in the past but they really didn’t get all the odor out. This product got all of the odor out and left a subtle clean odor. I was shocked by how much dirt it got out. It also removed stains.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Not a miracle. The scent is SO STRONG I have a splitting headache from it. It makes me nauseous. It doesn’t even clean well at all either. Not worth it. Way too expensive for a product that is ridiculously scented and doesn’t truly clean. Upset I spent money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have 4 young kids and they all find a way to spill something on the carpet. I usually use my own vinegar mix but needed a deep clean so i thought I'd try this stuff and I'm glad I did! It is a little pricey but all carpet shampoos are. I am going to buy the big bottle next.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS OK
customer_reviews.text: Throw rugs/pets.Follwed directions.Had several throw rugs (7) various fiber content,dirty but not awful. Did not see much difference-product ineffective and a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on my white carpet !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing - it smells so good and it cleans my carpets so well. I feel good knowing my dogs and baby are okay walking around on it after. I clean my carpets monthly because we don't have a no shoe policy and have a baby and dogs who throw all sorts of stuff on the white carpet - takes everything out!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably Cleaner and Brighter
customer_reviews.text: I thought my carpet needed only a light cleaning, until I cleaned one half of the room. The half cleaned with carpet miracle was noticeably cleaner and the color brighter. The cleaning power seemed much better than the solution that came with the hoover smartwash. I used a 50/50 mix for normal cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: ltighe

customer_reviews.title: Deodorizer and leaves clean scent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with outcome. Used with rented Bissell cleaner. It does deodorize and the scent was pleasant. It worked well with rented machine. You do have to dilute product. Once dry, the carpets were not sticky or hard. I would not say it repels stains or other messes. Definitely will use again when I deep clean carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice fresh smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and continually order it over and over again, the only conn is I don’t feel it actually eliminates tough odors. It does give your carpet a very nice fresh smell, but it only lasts a week at a time. I had to use another product to eliminate a lingering pet odor. Overall it’s a good product to keep your carpets fresh and clean, but if you are looking to knock out tough orders I would go with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: As a mother with a toddler and white carpets this did NOT meet my expectation by any means. It lightened the stain but did not get rid of it. And we doused areas the stains with this stuff to no avail. We used the full concentrated formula without diluting it and it didnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Clean!!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet shampoo worked wonders on our carpets. I used other carpet shampoos and they didn't get the dark stains out at all. This however got just about ALL of them out!! I will be stocking up on this!! Seriously buy it if you need your carpet cleaned. The scent smells so fresh!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but didnt work on 2 stains
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and hearing about this product from a friend, I thought I would give this stuff a shot. I have 2 stains in my carpet and I have tried everything to get them out. This stuff was my last hope and it didnt work. I used half a bottle on these 2 spots, I tried my big shampooer and my spot cleaner. I am disappointed with this product. The pictures are before and after and didnt do a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have kids or pets!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!!! My son had a stomach bug and had been drinking red Gatorade. He didn't make it to the bathroom before he threw up. Needless to say, I thought our new carpet was ruined. This took out the entire stain!!! Amazing stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

product_meta.title: Carpet Miracle - Concentrated Machine Shampoo, Deep Stain and Odor Remover Solution, Deodorizing Formula (32FL OZ)
feature_bullets: CARPET MIRACLE - Cleans & Deodorizes Carpet & Upholstery to its original soft & beautiful condition
FOR ALL MACHINES - Hoover, Bissell, Rug Doctor, Kenmore, Carpet Express (Sears, Home Depot, Walmart)
CARPET CLEANING SOLUTION - works on all water safe surfaces: Carpets & Rugs to Furniture & Auto Uph.
CHILDREN, PET & EARTH FRIENDLY - Carpet Miracle is Biodegradable & Non-Toxic. Safe & Very Effective!
100% GUARANTEE - If you are not 100% in LOVE with Carpet Miracle, send it back for a full refund!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,291 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
